Class AbstractQuestion

java.lang.Object
team.logica_populi.dragonscore.base.logic.AbstractQuestion
All Implemented Interfaces:
Question
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseQuestion, TrueFalseQuestion, YesNoQuestion
public abstract class AbstractQuestion extends Object implements Question
A basic implementation of the Question interface.
